I never imagined-even in my wildest dreams-that we would get as far, as fast as we have today," Mr. Eric Schmidt said in a post on the Official Google Blog. Search has quite literally changed people's lives-increasing the collective sum of the world's knowledge and revolutionizing advertising in the process. And our emerging businesses-display, Android, YouTube and Chrome-are on fire. Of course, like any successful organization we've had our fair share of good luck, but the entire team-now over 24,000 Googlers globally-deserves most of the credit. Google's co-founders brought in Mr. Eric Schmidt , a trained computer scientist, to shepherd the young company along in the early days of the dot-com boom and eventually he helped take Google public in 2004.
